attributes.action: Bring back Nit Nurses into Primary and Secondary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As parents we are fed up of forever fighting a losing battle with headlice.  Some parents dont seem to check their kids so the return of the nitnurse and the inspections should prevent the spreading of this AGAIN

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
